section.p: The other cultists nod as you enter. ‘May His name never be spoken,’ they intone in ritual greeting.
‘Whose name? Shush!’ you reply in the words of the time-honoured catechism.

It is almost time for supper. If you have a
pirate captain’s head
or a
witch’s hand
to add to the simmering stew, the other cultists present you with a prize medallion worth
.
After having your loathsome meal, you slip furtively back to town. .
